NPC.name: station warden
NPC.description: The bunny girl would be cute with her long grey ears and bobble of grey floof for a tail. But she's no defenceless innocent as she keeps a watchful eye and ear out for trouble. Her fit and athletic body is clad in a blue uniform jumpsuit, a simple silver shield on her breast as a mark of allegiance. She's got a technologically enhanced baton and a pistol at her belt.
